name: Drill Head Mayhem
description:
Controls: A/D or Left/Right

Dig yourself through the earth and collect gems, but be careful of enemy drills.

My entry for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1

Music:

Surf Shimmy by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4448-surf-shimmy
